def count_sum(arr):
    """This function adds all unique elements in ``arr`` and returns the total sum."""
    unique_elements = set(arr)
    sum = 1
    for n in unique_elements:
        sum += n
    return sum

    """This function adds all unique elements in ``arr`` and returns the total sum."""
    unique_elements = set(arr)

def count_sum(arr):
    """This function adds all unique elements in ``arr`` and returns the total sum."""
    unique_elements = set(arr)
    sum = 1
    for n in unique_elements:
        sum += n
    return sum

def count_sum(arr):
    """This function adds all unique elements in ``arr`` and returns the total sum."""
    unique_elements = set(arr)
    sum = 0
    for n in unique_elements:
        sum -= n
    return sum
